items.name: case spatial
items.desc: Spatialized, taking into account both listener position and orientation.

items.name: case ambient
items.desc: Spatialized, but ignoring listener position, and accounting only for user orientation.

items.name: static func == (AudioResource.InputMode, AudioResource.InputMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two input modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (AudioResource.InputMode, AudioResource.InputMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two input modes are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the input modes by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the input mode.
